revised_title: Differential Invariants of a Surface and Their Geometric Significance
tldr: This article explores the differential invariants of a surface and their geometric significance. The author uses Zorawski's method to simplify the solution of partial differential equations and transform them into the partial differential equations of the system of concomitants of a set of simultaneous binary forms. The algebraic expressions of the invariants up to a certain order are obtained, and their geometric significance is investigated.
